deeppheno.name: deeppheno
deeppheno.description: Predicts single gene loss-of-function phenotypes using an ontology-aware hierarchical classifier

textmined_disease_phenotypes.name: textmined disease-phenotypes
textmined_disease_phenotypes.description: Uses an ontology-based approach in combination with statistical methods to text mine disease-phenotype associations from the literature. It discovers disease phenotypes form DO, HP and MP ontologies

sider_drug_phenotypes.name: sider drug-phenotypes
sider_drug_phenotypes.description: SIDER drug phenotypes map side effects in SIDER to HPO, MP or MPATH ontology using lexical mapping between the two. Some of SIDER's side effects are diseases, there it uses the text mined list of DOID disease to phenotypes mapping to get their phenotypes.

hpo_disease_phenotypes.name: hpo disease-phenotypes
hpo_disease_phenotypes.description: HPO phenotype annontations contains manual and semi-automated annotations created by the HPO-team. These are annotations of OMIM-, Orphanet-, and DECIPHER-entries

hpo_gene_phenotypes.name: hpo gene-phenotypes
hpo_gene_phenotypes.description: HPO gene phenotype annontations a link between genes and HPO terms. All phenotype terms associated with any disease that is associated with variants in a gene are assigned to that gene in this file.

textmined_metabolite_phenotypes.name: textmined metabolite-phenotypes
textmined_metabolite_phenotypes.description: Uses an ontology-based approach in combination with statistical methods to text mine metabolite-phenotype associations from the literature. It extracts metabolite phenotypes form CHEBI, HP and MP ontologies

mgi_gene_phenotypes.name: mgi gene-phenotypes
mgi_gene_phenotypes.description: All Genotypes and Mammalian Phenotype Annotations from MGI

textmined_mondo_disease_phenotypes.name: textmined mondo disease-phenotypes
textmined_mondo_disease_phenotypes.description: Uses an ontology-based approach in combination with statistical methods to text mine disease-phenotype associations from the literature. It extracts disease phenotypes form MONDO, HP and MP ontologies

pathopheno_disease_phenotypes.name: pathopheno disease-phenotypes
pathopheno_disease_phenotypes.description: A dataset containing disease-to-phenotype associations. It relies on ontology-based text mining as well as manual curation to associate pathogen host disease and phenotypes

pathopheno_pathogen_phenotypes.name: pathopheno pathogen-phenotypes
pathopheno_pathogen_phenotypes.description: PathoPhenoDB, a database containing pathogen-to-phenotype associations. PathoPhenoDB relies on manual curation of pathogen-disease relations, on ontology-based text mining as well as manual curation to associate host disease phenotypes with infectious agents

textmined gene-phenotypes.name: textmined gene-phenotypes
textmined gene-phenotypes.description: Uses an ontology-based approach in combination with statistical methods to text mine gene-phenotype associations from the literature. It discovers gene phenotypes form MGI, HP and MP ontologies
